<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Selling, general and administrative expenses for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 increased to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$777.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$771.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year, primarily as a result of higher strategic technology spending on new enterprise-wide customer and content management systems and the migration to software as a service ("SaaS") and cloud-based technology solutions. To a lesser extent, the increase was due to higher employee-related expenses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$7.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;associated with the book fairs channel efforts to increase revenues, higher sales management-related expenses associated with the classroom books and literacy initiatives to increase sales and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in expenses related to a branch consolidation project in the Company's book fairs operations, coupled with a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;insurance settlement in the prior fiscal year relating to a fire in a warehouse in India. The increases were partially offset
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;23
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage26"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	by lower international expense attributable to foreign currency translation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$15.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, lower unabsorbed overhead burden as costs were being offset by transition service fees under the transition services agreement with the purchaser of the educational technology and services business in fiscal 2016, and lower pension expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$4.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;related to a settlement on a portion of the domestic pension plan in the prior fiscal year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Severance expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$11.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal 2016 included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$9.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;related to cost reduction and restructuring programs. Severance expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$9.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal 2015 included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;related to cost reduction and restructuring programs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Asset impairments for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$14.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$15.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year. In fiscal 2016, the Company recognized a pretax impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$7.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;on the abandonment of legacy building improvements in connection with the Company's renovation of its headquarters location in New York City. The renovation effort will occur in phases and, as additional floors are renovated over the project's life, additional building improvements will be abandoned. The first phase of the construction, which began in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016, represents approximately 40% of the total renovation project for the entire building. The Company also recognized a pretax impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$6.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for certain legacy prepublication assets. In fiscal 2015, the Company recognized an impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in respect to certain goodwill, production and programming assets in connection with the restructuring of the Company's media and entertainment businesses, recognized an impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$4.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the discontinuation of certain outdated technology platforms and recognized an impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;associated with the closure of its retail store located at the Company headquarters in New York City.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	For the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016, net interest expense decreased to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year, due to the reduction in borrowings under the Loan Agreement described under "Financing" below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In fiscal 2016, the Company recognized a pretax gain of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;on the sale of a China-based cost method investment. In fiscal 2015, the Company recognized a pretax gain of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;related to a UK-based cost method investment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s effective tax rate for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	36.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	48.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Earnings from continuing operations for fiscal 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$28.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$44.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$15.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal 2015. The basic and diluted earnings from continuing operations per share of Class A Stock and Common Stock were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.29
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.26
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, respectively, in fiscal 2016, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.47
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.46
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, respectively, in fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Discontinued Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Loss from discontinued operations, net of tax, for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to earnings from discontinued operations, net of tax, of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$279.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year. The decrease was driven by the net gain of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$275.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;associated with the sale of the educational technology and services business in the prior fiscal year. The basic and diluted loss from discontinued operations per share of Class A Stock and Common Stock were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, respectively, in fiscal 2016, compared to basic and diluted earnings from discontinued operations per share of Class A Stock and Common Stock of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.53
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.34
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, respectively, in fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The resulting net income for fiscal 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$40.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;per basic and diluted share, respectively, compared to net income of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$294.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$9.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.80
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;per basic and diluted share, respectively, in fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Continuing Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Revenues from continuing operations for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 increased by $74.3 million, or 4.8%, to $1,635.8 million, compared to $1,561.5 million in the prior fiscal year. The book clubs and book fairs channels of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Children&#8217;s Book Publishing and Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;segment experienced higher revenues of $44.6 million and $25.1 million, respectively, driven by changes in the marketing strategies for these channels.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Education&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	segment revenues were also higher by $20.8 million, driven by increased circulation in classroom magazines and strong demand for the Company's guided reading programs. Offsetting the increases were lower revenues from the trade channel of $4.0 million, primarily resulting from lower Hunger Games trilogy sales, and&#160;lower revenues in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	International&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	segment, primarily
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;24
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage27"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	resulting from the adverse foreign exchange impact of $19.7 million in fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014, offset by overall higher revenues from international sales of $7.5 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenue for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 remained constant at 46.4% compared to the prior fiscal year. Higher product, service and production costs as a percentage of revenue were offset by lower royalty costs as a percentage of revenue, which were both primarily driven by the marketing strategies for the book club operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Selling, general and administrative expenses for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 increased to $771.1 million, compared to $727.3 million in the prior fiscal year. The increase was primarily driven in equal parts by higher promotional expense in the book clubs operations and higher technology expense on strategic initiatives. In addition, the Company experienced higher salary-related expenses and bad debt expense of $6.1 million and $3.3 million, respectively, and incremental pension expense of $2.6 million related to a settlement on a portion of the domestic pension plan. The overall technology spend increased by $2.9 million in fiscal 2015 as the higher technology expense within Selling, general and administrative expenses was largely offset by lower depreciation expense within Depreciation and amortization as more of the technology spend in fiscal 2015 related to the design phase of projects which resulted in lower capitalized technology costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Severance expense of $9.6 million in fiscal 2015 included $8.9 million related to cost reduction and restructuring programs. Severance expense of $10.5 million in fiscal 2014 included $9.9 million related to cost reduction initiatives.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In fiscal 2015, the Company recognized asset impairments of $15.8 million, compared to $28.0 million in the prior fiscal year. In fiscal 2015, the Company recognized an impairment charge of $8.3 million in respect to certain goodwill, production and programming assets in connection with the restructuring of the Company's media and entertainment businesses, recognized an impairment charge of $4.6 million for the discontinuation of certain outdated technology platforms and recognized an impairment charge of $2.9 million associated with the closure of its retail store located at the Company headquarters in New York City. In fiscal 2014, the Company recognized an asset impairment of $14.6 million related to Storia operating system-specific apps that were no longer supported due to the transition to a Storia streaming model and a $13.4 million impairment of goodwill attributable to legacy acquisitions associated with the book club operations in the&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Children&#8217;s Book Publishing and Distribution&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	segment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	For the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015, net interest expense decreased to $3.5 million, compared to $6.9 million in the prior fiscal year, primarily due to the absence of capital leases associated with the purchase of 555 Broadway, partially offset by higher interest on borrowings under the Company's Loan Agreement related to such purchase.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In fiscal 2015, the Company recognized a gain of $0.6 million related to a UK-based cost method investment. In fiscal 2014, the Company recognized investment losses of $5.8 million relating to a $1.0 million loss for a U.S.-based equity method investment and a $4.8 million loss related to a UK-based cost method investment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s effective tax rate for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 was 48.2%, compared to 678.3% in the prior fiscal year. The effective tax rate for fiscal 2014 was favorably impacted by a settlement with the Internal Revenue Service and the associated recognition of $13.8 million of previously unrecognized income tax positions, including interest.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Earnings from continuing operations for fiscal 2015 increased by $2.2 million to $15.5 million, compared to $13.3 million in fiscal 2014. The basic and diluted earnings from continuing operations per share of Class A Stock and Common Stock were $0.47 and $0.46, respectively, in fiscal 2015, compared to $0.42 and $0.41, respectively, in fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Discontinued Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Earnings from discontinued operations, net of tax, for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 were $279.1 million, compared to earnings from discontinued operations, net of tax, of $31.1 million in the prior fiscal year. The increase was driven by the net gain of $275.6 million associated with the sale of the educational technology and services business. Fiscal 2015 discontinued operations also included the net earnings from the educational technology and services business of $5.2 million, partially offset by net losses of $1.4 million associated with consumer magazine, production, and game console activities that were discontinued in fiscal 2015 and $0.3 million in losses from previously discontinued business units. In fiscal 2014, the educational technology and services business had net earnings of $31.4 million, partially offset by net losses of $0.4 million associated with consumer magazine, production, and game console activities that were discontinued in fiscal 2015 and $0.1 million in net gain from previously
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">

</DIV>

<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	discontinued business units. The basic and diluted earnings from discontinued operations per share of Class A Stock and Common Stock were $8.53 and $8.34, respectively, in fiscal 2015, compared to $0.97 and $0.95, respectively, in fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The resulting net income for fiscal 2015 was $294.6 million, or $9.00 and $8.80 per basic and diluted share, respectively, compared to net income of $44.4 million, or $1.39 and $1.36 per basic and diluted share, respectively, in fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	* Other operating expenses include selling, general and administrative expenses, bad debt expenses and depreciation and amortization.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Fiscal 2016 compared to fiscal 2015
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Revenues for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$43.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1,002.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$958.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year. Trade channel revenues increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$25.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, primarily due to higher trade publishing sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$35.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. The increase in trade publishing revenues were driven by strong sales for both frontlist and backlist titles and the strong performance of Harry Potter, including frontlist titles such as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone: The Illustrated Edition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and the Harry Potter-themed coloring books as well as an increase in backlist titles, partially offset by lower year-over-year sales of Minecraft titles. The higher trade publishing revenues were partially offset by lower sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$9.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the media operations now included within the trade channel due to the Company's restructuring of the media and entertainment business. The book fairs channel revenues increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$23.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;due to a 3.4% increase in revenue per fair coupled with a 1.0% increase in fair count. The book club channel revenues decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$4.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;due to lower number of book club events caused by the relatively late start to the school calendar compared to the prior fiscal year, partially offset by a 2.3% increase in revenue per event. Sales of Minecraft series handbook titles across all Children's Book Publishing and Distribution channels totaled $22.2 million for the current fiscal year, compared to $57.1 million in the prior fiscal year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Cost of goods sold for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$418.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	41.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of revenues, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$409.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	42.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of revenues, in the prior fiscal year. Cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenue remained relatively flat for this segment, with a modest improvement due to lower production amortization costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Other operating expenses were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$470.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$453.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year. The increase was partially due to higher employee-related expenses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$7.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the book fairs channel, primarily associated with continued efforts to improve sales, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in expenses related to a branch consolidation project in the Company's book fairs operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Asset impairments were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$10.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year. In fiscal 2016, the Company recognized an impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for certain legacy prepublication assets. In the prior fiscal year, the Company recognized an impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in respect to certain goodwill, production and programming assets associated with the restructuring of the media and entertainment business and a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;impairment charge relating to the transition to a new ecommerce software platform for club ordering.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Segment operating income for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$110.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$85.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year. The increase was driven by higher revenues, primarily from the trade publishing channel and the book fairs channel, relatively flat cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenues and lower impairment charges, partially offset by higher employee-related expenses associated with the efforts to improve the book fairs channel sales.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;26
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage29"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Revenues for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 increased by $65.7 million to $958.7 million, compared to $893.0 million in the prior fiscal year. Revenues from the book clubs channel increased $44.6 million due to the success of the Company's marketing initiatives implemented in fiscal 2014, higher revenue per book club event and a 5% increase in the number of teacher sponsors. The Company's book fair revenues increased $25.1 million due to a 4% increase in revenue per fair, coupled with a 1% increase in fair count. Revenues in the trade channel decreased $4.0 million when compared to the prior fiscal year. The decrease was primarily driven by lower gross sales of Hunger Games trilogy titles of $19.7 million and was partially offset by the success of the Minecraft handbook series that resulted in higher gross sales of $16.1 million, strong sales of Raina Telgemeier's titles
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Sisters
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Drama
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Smile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and favorable returns experience on Harry Potter titles. Sales of Minecraft series handbook titles across all Children's Book Publishing and Distribution channels totaled $57.1 million for fiscal 2015, compared to $13.1 million in fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Cost of goods sold for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 was $409.1 million, or 43% of revenues, compared to $384.5 million, or 43% of revenues, in the prior fiscal year. Cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenue remained relatively flat for this segment, with modestly higher costs for books sold through the book clubs and trade channels offset by lower prepublication and amortization costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Other operating expenses were $453.8 million for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015, compared to $456.7 million in the prior fiscal year, as increased promotional expense for the book clubs operation of $11.0 million and higher bad debt expense of $2.7 million were more than offset by lower technology costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Asset impairments for the segment were $10.2 million for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015, compared to $28.0 million in the prior fiscal year. As part of the Company's restructuring of the media and entertainment businesses, the trade channel recognized an impairment charge of $8.3 million in respect to certain goodwill, production and programming assets. In addition, the book clubs channel incurred a $1.9 million impairment charge relating to the transition to a new ecommerce software platform for club ordering. In fiscal 2014, the segment incurred $14.6 million of asset impairments related to Storia operating system-specific apps that are no longer supported due to the transition to a Storia streaming model and a $13.4 million goodwill impairment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Segment operating income for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 was $85.6 million, compared to $23.8 million in the prior fiscal year. The increase was driven by the higher book club and book fair revenues, lower prepublication and amortization costs and lower technology costs. Results in fiscal 2015 included $10.2 million in asset impairment charges relating to the restructuring of the media and entertainment businesses and the transition to a new ecommerce software platform for club ordering. Results in fiscal 2014 included charges of $18.0 million related to Storia asset impairments and other charges due to the transition to a Storia streaming model and a $13.4 million goodwill impairment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

	EDUCATION
</FONT>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	($ amounts in millions)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD COLSPAN="4" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	*&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Other operating expenses include selling, general and administrative expenses, bad debt expenses and depreciation and amortization.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Fiscal 2016 compared to fiscal 2015
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Revenues for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$22.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$298.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$275.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in the prior fiscal year.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$13.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of the increase was primarily driven by classroom books and literacy initiatives due to strong fiscal year fourth quarter sales of classroom books and guided reading and customized curriculum programs. Classroom magazines revenues increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$5.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;due to higher circulation and consumer magazines revenues increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;due to increased digital and custom publishing programs. These
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;27
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage30"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	businesses benefit from continued demand for in-class supplemental reading offerings. Partially offsetting the increase were lower sales in library publishing of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Cost of goods sold for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$99.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	33.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$94.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	34.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the prior fiscal year. Cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenue remained relatively flat for this segment, with modest improvement due to the higher margins associated with the Company's classroom magazines.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Other operating expenses increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$9.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016, due to higher sales management-related expenses as part of the Company's continued efforts to increase sales from classroom books and literacy initiatives and higher operating expenses related to the increased circulation of classroom magazines.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Asset impairments were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016, due to impairment charges for certain legacy prepublication assets.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Segment operating income for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016 improved by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$4.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. The increase was driven by the higher sales from classroom books and literacy initiatives, as well as from classroom magazines, coupled with the relatively flat cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenues, partially offset by higher sales management-related expenses and impairment charges.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Revenues for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 increased by $20.8 million to $275.9 million, compared to $255.1 million in the prior fiscal year. As a result of the continued demand for independent reading materials for the classroom, revenues from classroom books and literacy initiatives, including guided reading programs such as the Guided Reading Nonfiction 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:PT">
	nd
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;Edition, increased by $14.4 million in fiscal 2015, compared to the prior fiscal year. Classroom magazine revenues increased $8.1 million primarily due to&#160;increased circulation driven by demand for the Company&#8217;s print and online offerings such as Scholastic News
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:PT">
	&#174;
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, Scope
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:PT">
	&#174;
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and Storyworks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:PT">
	&#174;
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. Revenues from sales of library publishing products were relatively flat. Revenues for supplemental teaching resource materials declined $3.5 million due to lower sales from retail channels.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Cost of goods sold for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 was $94.0 million, or 34% of revenue, compared to $89.6 million, or 35% of revenue, in the prior fiscal year. The lower cost of goods sold as a percentage of revenue was primarily due to higher volumes of classroom magazines, which carry relatively low variable costs, and improved postage, freight and handling costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Other operating expenses increased by $6.5 million for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015, due to higher employee-related expenses and promotional costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Segment operating income for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2015 improved by $9.9 million. Higher classroom magazine circulation drove $4.1 million of this improvement, as demand continued for nonfiction materials to supplement classroom learning. Classroom books and literacy initiatives contributed $5.3 million to the increase in operating income.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_11"></A>

	INTERNATIONAL
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-TOP:2PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;

</DIV>

<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
