</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	New Accounting Pronouncements
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	ASU 2016-13
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In June 2016, the Financial Accounting Standards Board (the "FASB") issued Accounting Standards Update (the "ASU") 2016-13,&#160;Financial Instruments - Credit Losses (Topic 326). This ASU introduces amendments to the accounting for credit losses on instruments defined within the ASU's scope and will impact both financial services and non-financial
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;47
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage50"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	services entities. Due to its broad scope, which includes trade and lease receivables, this ASU states that it is likely that all entities will need to evaluate the impact of its amendments. Under the amendments, an entity will recognize, as an allowance, its estimate of expected credit losses, which the FASB believes will result in more timely recognition of such losses. The ASU does not prescribe a specific method to make the estimate so its application will require significant judgment. This ASU is effective for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2019, and interim periods within those fiscal years. Early adoption will be permitted for all entities for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2018, including interim periods within those fiscal years.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The ASU will be effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2021. The Company is evaluating the impact of this ASU on its consolidated financial position, results of operations and cash flows.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	ASU 2016-09
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In March 2016, the FASB issued the ASU 2016-09,&#160;Compensation - Stock Compensation (Topic 718): Improvements to Employee Share-Based Payment Accounting. The amendments in this ASU require, among other things, that all income tax effects of awards be recognized in the income statement when the awards vest or are settled. The ASU also allows for an employer to repurchase more of an employee's shares than it can today for tax withholding purposes without triggering liability accounting and allows for a policy election to account for forfeitures as they occur. The amendments in this ASU are effective for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2016, including interim periods within those fiscal years. Early adoption is permitted for any entity in any interim or annual period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The ASU will be effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2018. The Company is evaluating the impact of this ASU on its consolidated financial position, results of operations and cash flows.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	ASU 2016-02
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In February 2016, the FASB issued ASU 2016-02, Leases (Topic 842). The amendments in this ASU require, among other things, lessees to recognize and a right-of-use asset and a lease liability in the balance sheet for all leases. The lease liability will be measured at the present value of the lease payments over the lease term. the right-of-use asset will be measured at the lease liability amount, adjusted for lease prepayments, lease incentives received and lessee's initial direct costs (e.g., commissions). The amendments in this ASU will take effect for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2018, including interim periods within those fiscal years. Earlier application is permitted as of the beginning of an interim or annual reporting period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The ASU will be effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2020. The Company is evaluating the impact of this ASU on its consolidated financial position, results of operations and cash flows.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	ASU 2015-17
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In November 2015, the FASB issued ASU 2015-17,&#160;Income Taxes (Topic 740): Balance Sheet Classification of Deferred Taxes. The amendments in this ASU eliminate the current requirement for entities to present deferred tax liabilities and assets as current and noncurrent in a classified statement of financial position and instead require that deferred income tax liabilities and assets be classified as noncurrent in a classified statement of financial position. The amendments in this ASU are effective for financial statements issued for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2016, including interim periods within those fiscal years. Earlier application is permitted as of the beginning of an interim or annual reporting period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company has elected an early application of this ASU for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2016, and has presented the net deferred tax assets as noncurrent and has reclassified current deferred tax assets in its consolidated financial position on a prospective basis. Therefore,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$81.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of Deferred income taxes reported in fiscal 2015 were not reclassified from current assets to Noncurrent deferred income taxes.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	ASU 2015-16
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In September 2015, the FASB issued ASU 2015-16, Business Combinations (Topic 805): Simplifying the Accounting for Measurement-Period Adjustments. The amendments in this ASU eliminate the requirement under the current guidance that an acquirer retrospectively adjust provisional amounts recognized in a business combination during the measurement period. The measurement period is up to one year from the date of the acquisition. The ASU requires that an acquirer recognize adjustments to provisional amounts that are identified during the measurement period in the reporting period in which the adjustment amounts are determined, and that the acquirer records, in the same period's financial statements, the effect on earnings of changes in depreciation, amortization, or other income effects, if any, as a result of the change to the provisional amounts, calculated as if the accounting had been completed at the acquisition date. The financial statements should also separately present on the face of the income statement, or disclose in the footnotes, the amount of adjustments recorded in the current period by line item that would have been recorded in prior periods had the adjustment been made at the date of acquisition. The amendments in this ASU are
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;48
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage51"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	effective for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2015, including interim periods within those fiscal years, and should be applied prospectively to provisional amount adjustments that occur after the effective date. Earlier application is permitted as of the beginning of an interim or fiscal year period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The ASU will be effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2017. The Company does not expect the amendments in this ASU to have a material impact on the consolidated financial position, results of operations and cash flows.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	ASU 2015-11
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In July 2015, the FASB issued ASU 2015-11, Inventory (Topic 330): Simplifying the Measurement of Inventory, as part of its Simplification Initiative. Currently, inventory is measured at the lower of cost or market. The amendments in this ASU require entities that measure inventory using any method other than last-in, first-out or the retail inventory method to measure inventory at the lower of cost and net realizable value. Net realizable value is the estimated selling price in the ordinary course of business less reasonably predictable costs of completion, disposal and transportation. The amendments in this ASU are effective for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2016, including interim periods within those fiscal years. The amendments should be applied prospectively and earlier application is permitted as of the beginning of an interim or fiscal year period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The ASU will be effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2018. The Company is evaluating the impact of this ASU on its consolidated financial position, results of operations and cash flows.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Topic 606, Revenue from Contracts with Customers
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In May 2014, the FASB announced that it is amending the FASB Accounting Standards Codification ("ASC") by issuing ASU 2014-09, Topic 606, Revenue from Contracts with Customers (the "New Revenue Standard"). The amendments in this ASU provide a single model for use in accounting for revenue arising from contracts with customers and supersedes current revenue recognition guidance, including industry-specific revenue guidance. The core principle of the new ASU is that revenue should be recognized to depict the transfer of promised goods or services to customers in an amount that reflects the consideration to which the entity expects to be entitled in exchange for those goods and services. New disclosures about the nature, amount, timing and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows arising from contracts with customers are also required. In August 2015, the FASB issued ASU 2015-14 which deferred the effective date of the New Revenue Standard. In 2016, the FASB issued ASU 2016-08, ASU 2016-10, ASU 2016-11, and ASU 2016-12 to clarify, among other things, the implementation guidance related to principal versus agent considerations, identifying performance obligations, and accounting for licenses of intellectual property. The New Revenue Standard is effective for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2017, including interim periods within those fiscal years. Early application is not permitted. The amendments in this update are to be applied on a retrospective basis, either to each prior reporting period presented or by presenting the cumulative effect of applying the update recognized at the date of initial application.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The New Revenue Standard will be effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2019. The Company is evaluating the adoption methodology and the impact of this ASU on its consolidated financial position, results of operations and cash flows.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="SCHL5312016-10K_HTM_S917E55725205CB299D0753732A3714DC">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	2. DISCONTINUED OPERATIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company continuously evaluates its portfolio of businesses for both impairment and economic viability, as well as for possible strategic dispositions. The Company monitors the expected cash proceeds to be realized from the disposition of discontinued operations&#8217; assets, and adjusts asset values accordingly. As a result, the Company closed or sold several operations during fiscal 2015. All of these businesses are classified as discontinued operations in the Company&#8217;s Consolidated Financial Statements.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Educational Technology and Services Business
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	On May 29, 2015, the Company completed the sale of substantially all of the assets comprising the educational technology and services (&#8220;Ed Tech&#8221;) business for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$575.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. The consideration received was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$577.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$34.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;was deposited in escrow for 18 months as security for potential indemnification and other obligations and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;was received in estimated working capital adjustments. The sale included substantially all of the assets of the Ed Tech segment including, but not limited to, current assets, accounts receivable, tangible personal property, certain leases, inventory, business products (including related intellectual property), rights under transferred contracts, rights of action and all associated goodwill and other intangible assets associated with the transferred assets. The carrying value of the net assets sold was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$123.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. In the third quarter of fiscal 2016, the working capital adjustments from the sale of the Ed Tech business were finalized, resulting in a payment to the purchaser of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;49
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage52"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In connection with the sale of the Ed Tech business to the purchaser, the Company entered into a transition services agreement whereby the Company provides administrative, distribution and other services to the purchaser for a minimum of 6 months and up to a maximum of 24 months. Transition service fees under this agreement are recorded in continuing operations as a reduction to Selling, general and administrative expenses.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	As of May 31, 2016, the Company had adequately fulfilled all service requirements under the transition services agreement and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$24.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;had been released from Restricted cash held in escrow in accordance with a related escrow agreement between the purchaser and the Company.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$4.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of the remainder of the escrow is subject to release periodically over the next 2 months upon fulfillment of certain service levels under the transition services agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$5.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of the remainder of the escrow is subject to release barring any disputes for breaches of representations and warranties within the next 6 months. All services under the transition services agreement will be terminated on August 1, 2016. The remaining escrow amounts are presented as Restricted cash held in escrow on the Consolidated Balance Sheets.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The transition services agreement provides for certain finance, accounting, information technology, supply chain, and other general services to facilitate the orderly transfer of the business operations to the purchaser. Fees and expenses related to the transition services agreement are not considered significant to the disposal transaction. As such, the operating results of the Ed Tech business, which were previously reported as the former
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Educational Technology and Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;segment, have been reported as a component of discontinued operations in the Consolidated Statements of Operations for the periods presented. In addition, the assets and liabilities of the Ed Tech business are classified as discontinued operations in the Consolidated Balance Sheets for the periods presented.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	All Other Discontinued Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	During fiscal 2015, the Company completed a restructuring of the businesses comprising its former
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Media, Licensing and Advertising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	segment and discontinued a subscription-based print magazine business, the animation and audio production business, and the game console digital content business, all of which were previously reported in such segment. During fiscal 2016, the Company did not discontinue any operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Fiscal 2016 discontinued operations assets, liabilities, and results from operations relate to insignificant continuing cash flows from passive activities. Fiscal 2015 Other accrued expenses within the current liabilities of discontinued operations included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$12.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;in payables for costs related to the sale of the Ed Tech business that had not been paid as of May 31, 2015. Those costs directly related to the discontinued operations of the Ed Tech business and were paid in fiscal 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="SCHL5312016-10K_HTM_S8849FC97C6DC2882793A53732AFBBEA3">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	3. SEGMENT INFORMATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company categorizes its businesses into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;reportable segments:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Children&#8217;s Book Publishing and Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Education,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	which comprise the Company's domestic operations, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	International
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. This classification reflects the nature of products and services consistent with the method by which the Company&#8217;s chief operating decision-maker assesses operating performance and allocates resources.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Children&#8217;s Book Publishing and Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;operates as an integrated business which includes the publication and distribution of children&#8217;s books, ebooks, media and interactive products in the United States through its book clubs and book fairs in its school channels and through the trade channel. This segment is comprised of three operating segments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Education
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;includes the publication and distribution to schools and libraries of children&#8217;s books, classroom magazines, supplemental classroom materials and print and on-line reference and non-fiction products for grades pre-kindergarten to 12 in the United States. This segment is comprised of two operating segments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	International
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;includes the publication and distribution of products and services outside the United States by the Company&#8217;s international operations, and its export and foreign rights businesses. This segment is comprised of three operating segments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

	(1)

	As discussed in Note 2, &#8220;Discontinued Operations,&#8221; the Company closed or sold several operations during the fourth quarter of fiscal 2015. All of these businesses are classified as discontinued operations in the Company&#8217;s financial statements and, as such, are not reflected in this table.
</FONT>

	Overhead includes all domestic corporate amounts not allocated to operating segments, including expenses and costs related to the management of corporate assets. Unallocated assets are principally comprised of deferred income taxes and property, plant and equipment related to the Company&#8217;s headquarters in the metropolitan New York area, its fulfillment and distribution facilities located in Missouri, its facility located in Connecticut and unabsorbed burden associated with the former educational technology and services business.
</FONT>

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Loan Agreement
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Scholastic Corporation and Scholastic Inc. (each, a &#8220;Borrower&#8221; and together, the &#8220;Borrowers&#8221;) are parties to a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$425.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;credit facility with certain banks (as amended, the &#8220;Loan Agreement&#8221;), which allows the Company to borrow, repay or prepay and reborrow at any time prior to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;December&#160;5, 2017
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;maturity date. Under the Loan Agreement, interest on amounts borrowed thereunder is due and payable in arrears on the last day of the interest period (defined as the period commencing on the date of the advance and ending on the last day of the period selected by the Borrower at the time each advance is made). The interest pricing under the Loan Agreement is dependent upon the Borrower&#8217;s election of a rate that is either: &#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_23"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	A Base Rate equal to the higher of (i) the prime rate, (ii) the prevailing Federal Funds rate plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.500%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;or (iii) the Eurodollar Rate for a one month interest period plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;plus, in each case, an applicable spread ranging from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.18%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.60%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, as determined by the Company&#8217;s prevailing consolidated debt to total capital ratio.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</TD>

</TD>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	1.18%

	&#32;to
</FONT>

	1.60%
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	As of May 31, 2016, the indicated spread on Base Rate Advances was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.18%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and the indicated spread on Eurodollar Rate Advances was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	1.18%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, both based on the Company&#8217;s prevailing consolidated debt to total capital ratio.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Loan Agreement also provides for the payment of a facility fee ranging from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.20%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.40%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;per annum based upon the Company&#8217;s prevailing consolidated debt to total capital ratio. At May 31, 2016, the facility fee rate was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	0.20%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	no
</FONT>

	&#32;outstanding borrowings under the Loan Agreement.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>

	The Loan Agreement contains certain covenants, including interest coverage and leverage ratio tests and certain limitations on the amount of dividends and other distributions, and at May 31, 2016, the Company was in compliance with these covenants.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	Lines of Credit
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	As of May 31, 2016, the Company&#8217;s domestic credit lines available under unsecured money market bid rate credit lines totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$25.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. There were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$20.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	365
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;days. These credit lines may be renewed, if requested by the Company, at the option of the lender.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$6.3
</FONT>

	17.0
</FONT>

</A>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	5. COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Lease obligations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company leases warehouse space, office space and equipment under various capital and operating leases over periods ranging from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;years. Certain of these leases provide for scheduled rent increases based on price-level factors. The Company generally does not enter into leases that call for contingent rent. In most cases, the Company expects that, in the normal course of business, leases will be renewed or replaced. Net rent expense relating to the Company&#8217;s non-cancelable operating leases for the three fiscal years ended May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$25.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$24.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$24.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, respectively. Net rent expense represents rent expense reduced for sublease income and lease payments received.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal years ended May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively, and is included in Depreciation and amortization expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">

	7.5

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company had open standby letters of credit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;issued under certain credit lines as of May 31, 2016 and 2015. These letters of credit are scheduled to expire within one year; however, the Company expects that substantially all of these letters of credit will be renewed, at similar terms, prior to expiration.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Contingencies
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Various claims and lawsuits arising in the normal course of business are pending against the Company. The Company accrues a liability for such matters when it is probable that a liability has occurred and the amount of such liability can be reasonably estimated. When only a range can be estimated, the most probable amount in the range is accrued unless no amount within the range is a better estimate than any other amount, in which case the minimum amount in the range is accrued. Legal costs associated with litigation loss contingencies are expensed in the period in which they are incurred. The Company does not expect, in the case of those various claims and lawsuits arising in the normal course of business where a loss is considered probable or reasonably possible, that the reasonably possible losses from such claims and lawsuits (either individually or in the aggregate) would have a material adverse effect on the Company&#8217;s consolidated financial position or results of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="SCHL5312016-10K_HTM_S913E7319938E2CA6F95F53732C9B4527">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	6. INVESTMENTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Included in the Other assets and deferred charges section of the Company&#8217;s Consolidated Balance Sheets were investments of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$26.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$26.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;at May 31, 2016 and May 31, 2015, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	48.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;equity interest in Make Believe Ideas Limited (MBI), a UK-based children's book publishing company, is accounted for using the equity method of accounting. Under the purchase agreement, and subject to its provisions, the Company will purchase the remaining outstanding shares in MBI following the completion of MBI's accounts for the calendar year 2018. The remaining controlling interest is held by a single third party and therefore the Company accounted for the investment using the equity method of accounting. The net value of this investment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$8.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$7.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;at May 31, 2016 and May 31, 2015, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	26.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;non-controlling interest in a separate children&#8217;s book publishing business located in the UK is accounted for using the equity method of accounting. The net value of this investment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$18.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$17.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;at May 31, 2016 and May 31, 2015, respectively. The Company received
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of dividends in fiscal 2016 from this investment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company has other equity and cost method investments that had a net value of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;at May 31, 2016 and May 31, 2015, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Income from equity investments reported in "Selling, general and administrative expenses" in the Consolidated Statements of Operations totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the year ended May 31, 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the year ended May 31, 2015 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the year ended May 31, 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	For the year ended May 31, 2016, the Company recognized a pretax gain of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;on the sale of a cost method investment in China. For the year ended May 31, 2015, the Company recognized a pretax gain of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;on the sale of a UK-based cost method investment that had previously been determined to be other than temporarily impaired. For the year ended May 31, 2014, the Company recognized an aggregate pretax loss of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$5.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for a UK-based and a U.S.-based cost method investment, each of which was determined to be other than temporarily impaired.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Depreciation and amortization expense related to property, plant, and equipment were $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	36.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$46.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$58.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal years ended May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively. In the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016, the Company recognized a pretax impairment charge of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$7.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;related to the abandonment of legacy building improvements in connection with the Company's renovation of its headquarters location in New York City.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In fiscal 2016, the Company purchased a U.S. based book fair business and a UK based book fair business resulting in the Company recognizing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of amortizable intangible assets, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	Amortization expense for Other intangibles totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.9

	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$2.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;for the fiscal years ended May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	Intangible assets with definite lives consist principally of customer lists, trademark and tradename rights and other agreements. Intangible assets with definite lives are amortized over their estimated useful lives. The weighted-average remaining useful lives of all amortizable intangible assets is approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	9. ACQUISITIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In fiscal 2016, the Company acquired
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of the share capital of Troubadour, Limited, a book fairs business located in the United Kingdom, for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#163;2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;million, net of cash acquired, which was equivalent to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	. Fair values were assigned to the assets and liabilities acquired, including inventory, trade receivables and payables, a customer list and fixed assets, in addition to cash. The Company utilized internally-developed discounted cash flow forecasts to determine the fair value of the customer list. The fair values of the net assets were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;which included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/26/0000866729-16-000030_MASTERSCHLREDBARLOGO.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:21PX;WIDTH:192PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;57
</FONT>
</DIV>

	intangible assets attributable to the customer list. The results of operations of this business subsequent to the acquisition are included in the

	&#32;segment. The transaction was not determined to be material to the Company's results and therefore pro forma financial information is not presented.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.5
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$0.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;of intangible assets. The results of operations of this business subsequent to the acquisition are included in the

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&#32;58
</FONT>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage61"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	The tax provision for the fiscal years ended May 31, 2016 and May 31, 2014 were favorably impacted by settlements with the Internal Revenue Service ( the "IRS"). During the third quarter of fiscal 2016, the Company reached a settlement with the IRS for fiscal years ended May 31, 2011, 2012 and 2013, and the Company recognized previously unrecognized tax benefits of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$4.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, inclusive of interest, as a result of this settlement. Subsequent periods remain open. During the third quarter of fiscal 2014, the Company reached a settlement with the IRS for fiscal years ended May 31, 2007, 2008 and 2009, and the Company recognized previously unrecognized tax benefits of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	13.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, inclusive of interest, as a result of this settlement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 700,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Unremitted Earnings
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	At May 31, 2016, the Company had not provided U.S. income taxes on accumulated but undistributed earnings of its non-U.S. subsidiaries of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$63.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;to the extent that such earnings are expected to be indefinitely reinvested. However, if any portion were to be distributed, the related U.S. tax liability may be reduced by foreign income taxes paid on those earnings. Determining the unrecognized deferred tax liability related to those investments in these non-U.S. subsidiaries is not practicable. The Company assesses foreign investment levels periodically to determine if all or a portion of the Company&#8217;s investments in foreign subsidiaries are indefinitely invested.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	Total net deferred tax assets of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$68.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;at May 31, 2016 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$87.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;at May 31, 2015 include
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$68.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, respectively, reported in noncurrent assets. Total net deferred tax assets of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$81.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;are reported in current assets as of May 31, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	For the year ended May 31, 2016, the valuation allowance increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$0.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;and for the year ended May 31, 2015, the valuation allowance decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	. The valuation allowance is based on the Company&#8217;s assessment that it is more likely than not that certain deferred tax assets will not be realized in the foreseeable future. The valuation allowance at May 31, 2016 relates to the Company's total foreign operating loss carryforwards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$115.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, principally in the UK, which do not expire. The benefits of uncertain tax positions are recorded in the financial statements only after determining a more likely-than-not probability that the uncertain tax positions will withstand challenge, if any, from taxing authorities, in which case such benefits are included in long-term income taxes payable, reduced by the associated federal deduction for state taxes and non-U.S. tax credits, and may also include other long-term tax liabilities that are not uncertain but have not yet been paid. The interest and penalties related to these uncertain tax positions are recorded as part of the Company&#8217;s income tax expense and constitute part of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Other noncurrent liabilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;on the Company&#8217;s Consolidated Balance Sheets.
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits at May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014 were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$17.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, excluding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;accrued for interest and penalties,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$17.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, excluding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$1.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;accrued for interest and penalties, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$14.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, excluding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;accrued for interest and penalties, respectively. Of the total amount of unrecognized tax benefits at May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$17.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$14.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$11.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, respectively, would impact the Company&#8217;s effective tax rate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	During the years presented, the Company recognized interest and penalties related to unrecognized tax benefits in the provision for taxes in the Consolidated Financial Statements. The Company recognized an expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$0.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, an expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$0.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	, and a benefit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;for the years ended May 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	Unrecognized tax benefits for the Company increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$0.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;for the year ended May 31, 2016 and increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	$2.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#32;for the year ended May 31, 2015. Although the timing of the resolution and/or closure on audits is highly uncertain, it is reasonably possible that the balance of gross unrecognized tax benefits could significantly change in the next twelve months. However, given the number of years remaining subject to examination and the number of matters being examined, the Company is unable to estimate the full range of possible adjustments to the balance of gross unrecognized tax benefits.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company, including its domestic subsidiaries, files a consolidated U.S. income tax return, and also files tax returns in various states and other local jurisdictions. Also, certain subsidiaries of the Company file income tax returns in foreign jurisdictions. The Company is routinely audited by various tax authorities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-income Taxes
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	The Company is subject to tax examinations for sales-based taxes. A number of these examinations are ongoing and, in certain cases, have resulted in assessments from taxing authorities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	The Company assesses sales tax contingencies for each jurisdiction in which it operates, considering all relevant facts including statutes, regulations, case law and experience.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2D2D2D;">
	Where a sales tax liability in respect to a jurisdiction is probable and can be reliably estimated for such jurisdiction, the Company has made accruals for these matters which are reflected in the Company&#8217;s Consolidated Financial Statements. These amounts are included in the Consolidated Financial Statements in Selling, general and administrative expenses. Future developments relating to the foregoing could result in adjustments being made to these accruals.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:MUSEO SANS 300,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;COLOR:#2C2C2C;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

</DIV>

	&#32;60
